rule: The people names field must contain a list of the people names mentioned in the input text separated by -||-.
input: John, Jane, and Bob are discussing environmental issues and sustainability.
output:
Company names:  
People names: John, Jane, Bob
Specific topics: Environmental issues, Sustainability
General themes: Discussion
complianceText:
The chatbot output does not have a comma-separated list of company names as specified in the description. It is also supposed to list specific topics and general themes using -||- but it did not follow that format. The people names part of the output seems to be in order but other parts do not comply with the provided description.
ERR
